entry.def: Tortoiseshell is the hard shell of a kind of sea turtle. It is brown and yellow in colour and is often polished and used to make jewellery and ornaments.
Tortoiseshell means made of tortoiseshell or made of a material which resembles tortoiseshell.

example.ex: He wears huge spectacles with thick tortoiseshell frames.
example.tran: 他戴着玳瑁粗框大眼镜。

entry.def: A tortoiseshell is a butterfly with brown and orange wings.

means.word_mean: 1. the mottled horny substance of the shell of some turtles
2. brilliantly colored; larvae feed on nettles
3. a cat having black and cream and yellowish markings
